original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽16.29. Saṅkiliṭṭhattika, Hetuduka🔽Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko nahetu dhammo🔽uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke aṭṭha🔽…pe… avigate terasa.
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  saṅkiliṭṭhattika hetuduka  saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam hetum dhammam paṭicca na saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ na hetu dhammo  uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā terasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke aṭṭha  pe a vigate terasa
translated: The Triad-Couplet Section of the Conditions🔽With a defiled-corrupted condition, a non-defiled-corrupted non-cause dhammas arises conditioned by root-cause condition. (Abbreviated.) In the root-cause, there are thirteen. In the object, there are nine. … In the kamma-result, there are eight. … In the dissociate, there are thirteen.

original: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke cha …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ na na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe vipāke cha pe avigate nava
translated: With a defiled-corrupted non-cause condition, a non-defiled-corrupted non-cause dhammas arises conditioned by root-cause condition. … There are three. (Abbreviated.) In the root-cause, there are nine. … In the kamma-result, there are six. … In the dissociate, there are nine.
